MailSender

public MailSender(String senderEmail,
                  String host,
                  int port)
           throws AddressException
Creates a new MailSender with given sender e-mail address and SMTP server

Parameters:
senderEmail - e-mail address to use as the sender address
host - hostname of the SMTP server
port - port of the SMTP server
Throws:
AddressException - if the sender e-mail isn't a valid e-mail address
